title: Chicken soup with rice
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios, Sheldon Riss and Maurice Sendak
brief_description: An excerpt from “Really Rosie”. Features a song about chicken soup with rice as a unifying theme to present an illustrated tour of the months of the year. Adapted from the children’s book, “The Nutshell kids” by Maurice Sendak. Music composed and performed by Carole King. Suitable for lower primary level.
